mapper.insert: insert into board values ((select nvl(max(board_number),0)+1 from board),#{supporter_id},to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi'),#{board_title},#{board_content},#{category},default)
mapper.select: select * from board where category='일반' order by board_number desc
select * from board_comment where board_number=#{board_number} order by comment_date
select * from board where category='공지' order by board_number desc
select * from board where category='일반' and (board_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or board_content like '%'||#{keyword}||'%') order by board_number desc
select * from board where category='일반' and supporter_id=#{supporter_id} order by board_number desc
select * from board where category='일반' order by board_commentCnt desc
mapper.update: update board set board_title=#{board_title}, board_content=#{board_content} where board_number=#{board_number}
mapper.insert: insert into board_comment values (#{board_number}||'_'||((select nvl(COUNT(comment_number),0)+1 from board_comment WHERE board_number=#{board_number})), #{board_number}, #{supporter_id}, #{comment_content}, to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy.mm.dd hh24:mi'))
mapper.update: update board set board_commentCnt=board_commentCnt+1 where board_number=#{board_number}
update board set board_commentCnt=board_commentCnt-1 where board_number=#{board_number}
